So good morning from Sintra, Portugal. Today
is a pretty special day because it is actually

our last day in Portugal and our last day
in Europe. We're getting ready to fly back

to Canada tomorrow and enjoy winter. So yeah,
we thought we would take one last day trip.

Sintra is only 40 minutes away from Lisbon
so it is super easy to get there and there

is a really cool castle that we're planning
to visit. But first up, we're really hungry

so we need to find some food ASAP. So let's
go.

to try Portuguese style Chinese food for the

The Castle of the Moors located in Sintra,
Portugal is a hilltop medieval castle dating

back to the 9th Century. It was taken by Christian
forces during the fall of Lisbon from the

Moors and is now classified as a National
Monument and UNESCO World Heritage Site.
